medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain with abnormal laboratory results.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient has been feeling generally unwell for the last 4 days, developing lower right quadrant abdominal pain with associated malaise and nausea.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Urinary retention, bladder stone removal via cystoscopy, chronic metabolic acidosis, legally blind in the left eye, DM type 1 with retinopathy and nephropathy (s/p kidney and pancreas transplant), transplant-related erythrocytosis, hyperlipidemia (HLD), hypertension (HTN), gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD), left kidney soft tissue mass.
